channel.title: Curate on John Davis - Hobby Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Curate on John Davis - Hobby Portfolio

item.title: Curate Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted on John Davis' website and Curate for Vision Pro and any other devices and platforms. INFORMATION WE COLLECT You may optionally add images to Curate galleries. These images are stored locally on device in the Curate app sandbox and are not synced across the network or communicated elsewhere. The images stored in the Curate are not stored with additional encryption.
